com.here.msdkui.routing

Class WaypointListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<WaypointListAdapter.WaypointsListViewHolder>
      • com.here.msdkui.routing.WaypointListAdapter

  • public class WaypointListAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<WaypointListAdapter.WaypointsListViewHolder>
    An adapter class that acts as a bridge between a WaypointEntry list and the WaypointListAdapter.WaypointsListViewHolder views that will be shown in a WaypointList.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WaypointListAdapter.WaypointsListViewHolder
      The view holder used for this adapter.
